## GraphBoot R Scripts

Creates degree distributions of the real world networks that are used in our experiments:

```{r}
require(plyr)
require(ggplot2)


rm(list=ls(all=TRUE))

vis<-function(inputFolder,dataset){
  
  dataFrame <-(read.csv(paste(inputFolder,dataset,"Dist.txt",sep=""),sep="\t",header=F))
  dataFrame$dataset<-dataset 
  return(dataFrame)
   
}
resultFolder <- "C:/Users/cxa123230/IdeaProjects/GraphBoot/results/"
data<- vis(resultFolder,"Facebook")
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Enron"))
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Dblp"))
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Epinions"))
data<-rbind(data,vis(resultFolder,"Wiki"))

m12<- ggplot(data,aes(x=V1,y=V3, linetype=dataset,color=dataset,group=dataset))+ geom_line(size=2)+ scale_x_log10(name="degree")+ theme(legend.position = c(0.8, 0.8),text = element_text(size=16))+ scale_y_continuous(name="fraction of nodes") +scale_linetype_manual(values=c(1, 2,3, 4,5)) 
m12
ggsave(filename=paste(resultFolder,"dists.eps",sep=""),plot=m12,width=6,height=4,unit="in")
 
```
